name: arachnode.net
short_description: arachnode.net is an open source Web crawler for downloading, indexing and storing Internet content including e-mail addresses, files, hyperlinks, images, and Web pages and is written in C# using SQL Server 2008. See http://arachnode.net for the LATEST.
